text: Future Primitive may refer to: * Future Primitive and Other Essays, a 1994 collection of essays by anarchist John Zerzan * Future Primitive: The New Ecotopias, a 1994 short story collection edited by Kim Stanley Robinson * Future Primitive (Paul Haslinger album), the debut album of Paul Haslinger * Future Primitive (The Vines album), the fifth album by Australian rock band The Vines * Future Primitive, Track 7 on Caravanserai, the fourth album by American Latin rock band Santana * Future Primitive, Track 1 on Deep Politics, the sixth album by American experimental rock band Grails * A 1985 skateboarding video by Powell Peralta
title: Future Primitive
